import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Redirect } from "react-router-dom" import { Table, Loader, Segment, Header } from 'semantic-ui-react' import HistoryRow from "../components/historyrow" class PlanHistory extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = {} } mapTableRows = () => { const copyTargets = [...this.state.savingTargets] return copyTargets.map(target => ) } componentDidMount() { fetch(`http://localhost:3000/api/v1/users/${this.props.userId}`) .then(resp => resp.json()) .then(data => this.setState({ storedUserDetails: data, savingTargets: data.saving_targets })) } render() { const { username } = this.props return ( username ?
Upcoming Plans A collection of your personal saving goals.
Plan Name Days till Plan Start Saving Goal Category {this.state.savingTargets ? this.mapTableRows() : null }
Plan Name Compleated On Amount Raised Plan Type

) } } export default PlanHistory;
